html body text table tbody tr td font p font b i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: : After your project plan isapproved and you are up and running, you can use the checklist below and relateditems to help you keep things moving according to your plan. Go through thislist at least weekly for each project you are managing.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: Refresh your memory about your project�s goals andboundaries. In particular, make sure you have a clear picture of what thedesired results should be at this point relative to deliverables, schedulecosts, quality, and so on.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: under ActionItem: Describe Project Scope if you don�t already have a formal scopestatement.*)

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: Analyze the status of each project deliverable. Are theyevolving as planned? If appropriate:

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. Locate lists of quality criteria that may be applied toinspect the quality and completeness of the deliverables at this stage of theproject.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 2. Check contractors� proposals or contracts to make sureyou know what they should be supplying at this point.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 4. Decide whether to accept inspected deliverables or torequire rework.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: Examine your milestones, key dates, and critical path. Are youwhere you need to be?

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
content: ANALYZE VARIANCES (DEVIATIONS FROM PLAN) BY COMPARING�ESTIMATED� TO �ACTUAL.�

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. Are activities taking longer than planned? (Are youexceeding estimates of duration?)

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 2. Are you using more resource hours than you planned?

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 3. Are your actual costs exceeding your estimated costs?

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 4. If minor variances are discovered (variances that can beresolved easily without changing the plan or scope), then resolve them.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 5. If major variances are discovered (variances that changethe scope or constitute significant project issues), then handle them asdescribed in the steps below.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font font span
html body text table tbody tr td font font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. Identify changes in scope (changes in deliverables,schedule, costs, etc.).

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
content: LIST, TRACK, AND TRY TO RESOLVE OPEN ISSUES.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. Make a list of all the unresolved issues, or

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 2. Revisit the list of open issues from the last inspectionperiod and try to resolve them.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. Locate the Risk Management Plan, if one has been created.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 2. Note particularly whether any of the ongoing events orupcoming events are identified in the risk management plan as particularlyvulnerable to risk.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. After completing the checks above, if you haven�t alreadydone so, talk to your team members and determine their perspective on projectstatus.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 2. Create and circulate a project status report.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
content: DRIVE FOR CLOSE-OUT OF ACTIVITIES AND SIGN-OFF OFDELIVERABLES AS APPROPRIATE.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 1. Ask yourself, �What activities can I close out? Whichdeliverables can I get formally approved and signed-off?�

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: 2. Prepare and get signatures on sign-off forms asappropriate.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: * underAction Item: Close Out Project Activities.*)

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
content: DECIDE WHETHER IT�S NECESSARY TO KILL THE PROJECT, THENDO SO IF APPROPRIATE.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font i span
content: Appendix E: Guidelines�When to Kill theProject.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
content: CREATE A LIST OF LESSONS LEARNED.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font span
content: Create a list of lessons learned that describes the wayssubsequent project activities must be modified in order to prevent thedifficulties encountered up to this point.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td font p font b span
html body text table tbody tr td font font span
content: Complete evaluation checklists, if applicable, and file them aspart of the official project records.
